title: Help, stuck at the patcher.
body:
I was playing a Normal with my friends, then the game crashes and I couldn't reconnect, then it got me stuck in the reconnect page, so I decided to un-install, and later on installing again, now I'm stuck at the patcher. May I get some helps, or some advice for how I might be able to fix this?



EDIT: It got fixed!

replies.body: Hey I'm glad to hear this was fixed, but the issue itself showed a lot of signs of an unstable connection.  Just to be safe, I recommend still going over our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to prevent any potential issues later on!
